overview: A robust adventure about two British adventurers who take over primitive Kafiristan as "godlike" rulers, meeting a tragic end through their desire for a native girl. Based on a short story by Rudyard Kipling.
original_title: The Man Who Would Be King
tagline: Rudyard Kipling's epic of splendor, spectacle and high adventure at the top of a legendary world.
cast: Sean Connery|Michael Caine|Christopher Plummer|Saeed Jaffrey|Doghmi Larbi
